candidate_data.translated_summary: Backend engineer focused on reliability and observability. Delivered a cost-efficient crawling pipeline (Spring Batch→Lambda/Playwright→S3→RDS) with Prometheus/Grafana/Loki; refactored a legacy service using 250 tests and CI/CD; developed a study-recruitment platform emphasizing transactional correctness and Testcontainers-based integration tests.
source_files: /mnt/data/김동현_최근 해결한 어려운 문제와 그 과정에서 배운 점.pdf

Projects.name: With-Ins (welfare center aggregation)
Projects.impact_en: Reduced incident detection time from ~30m to ~2m via structured Lambda responses + Prometheus metrics; ECS migration from EC2.

Projects.name: Cafegory — Legacy Refactor
Projects.impact_en: 250 tests guided safe incremental refactors; standardized testing, layered architecture, multi-module; zero-downtime deployments via Actions.

Projects.name: Cafegory — Study Recruitment Platform
Projects.impact_en: Fixed @Transactional side-effects in tests; adopted Testcontainers; ensured DTO boundaries; hierarchical comment query.

metrics.experience_years_note: Project timeline 2024–2025; employment tenure not explicitly stated.

testing_coverage.notes: 250 tests used to drive refactor; tests vs prod parity reported

Ownership: Drove infra migration from EC2→ECS and standardized configuration as code.
Problem_Solving: Eliminated test flakiness from JPA/@Transactional by adopting Testcontainers and revising boundaries.
Execution_BiasToAction: Delivered CI/CD pipelines and zero-downtime deploys to stabilize releases.
Craftsmanship_CodeQuality: Standardized test patterns and layered architecture; converted to multi-module structure.
Operational_Excellence: Implemented Prometheus/Loki monitoring and alerting to cut detection time from ~30m to ~2m.
